name: Super Mario Kart ZX (Gamejolt)
description:
So hello. If you found this game on my profile you might be wondering:

Why has Itchianas made a game without Unity?

That's because i reposted this game from Gamejolt as an attempt to spread this game to other platforms, so far i reposted to itch.io, but remember that it was originated from Gamejolt.

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Link to Original Game: https://gamejolt.com/games/mariokartzx/437665
